text:
October 2, 1961
Mr. J. W. Acda
Head, Central Programme Service
Radio Nederland Weraldomroap^
â€¢S-Gravelandseweg 70
Hilversum, Nederland
Dear Mr. Acda:
Thank you for your kind letter giving
me the details of my travel arrangements
which are most satisfactory.
1 have contacted the local KLM office
to confirm the arrangmments with them.
I am most anxiously looking forward
to seeing you again and to my visit to
Radio Nederland.
Sincerely yours,
WGH :i
William G. Harley
